original_title: 飛びだす冒険映画 赤影
overview: Heroic masked ninja Akakage (Red Shadow) and his two companions fight evil warlords in feudal Japan with their superhuman powers and high tech gadgets. Theatrical film with 3-D sequences based on the TV series KAMEN NO NINJA AKAKAGE.
title: Tobidasu Boken Eiga: Akakage
